mapper.select: select orders.create_date , orders.orders_number , room.house_number , room.type , room.room_money , room.room_image , room.description , pay.pay_money , user.username , user.phone , user.sex from orders left join room on orders.room_id = room.id left join user on orders.user_id = user.id left join pay on orders.pay_id = pay.id

select room.room_number , room.house_number , room.type , room.room_status , room.room_money , room.room_image , room.description , orders.orders_number , user.username from room left join orders on room.id = orders.room_id left join user on orders.user_id = user.id
mapper.update: update room set room.house_number = #{houseNumber} , room.room_image = #{roomImage} , room.description = #{description} , room.room_money = #{roomMoney} where room.room_number= #{roomNumber}
